name: Quadrivium
description:
In Quadrivium, the player can control different geometrical objects to pass the levels. These objects are incredibly advanced robots which explore and accumulate data from this fantasy-cosmic environment. There are 3 types of robots, but in the future we hope to develop more. Your main objective is to pass from a point to another without touching the red lines. Your impact with the red lines will be deadly and you will have to restart the level.

  • Classic adventure-arcade game
  • Over 35 levels
  • 2 modes
  • 3 characters

Supported Languages: English
